actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize payment of costs incurred in the alteration or replacement of certain municipal waste incinerators for the purpose of controlling air pollution.
subjects: Federal aid to air pollution control
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to air pollution control

summary.text: Authorizes payment of up to nine-tenths of the costs incurred in the alteration or replacement of unamortized municipal waste incinerators for the purpose of immediate compliance with air quality standards.

titles.title: A bill to authorize payment of costs incurred in the alteration or replacement of certain municipal waste incinerators for the purpose of controlling air pollution.
